content.detailedDescription:
Because of recent ufo reports/sightings in the land o' lakes, fl area i have been paying attention to the sky more than i normally would.  sometimes i take photos randomly just to see if i might capture something on film.  other times i take photos when something catches my eye.

the attached photos (reg. and crop/zoom) show a star-like object that appears to be "shooting" upward.  the object also appears to have a solid body object directly below the light.  i do not believe it is a star because the light is relatively close and my digital camera does not feature a zoom powerful enough to photograph stars.  the star-like object is not featured in the frames previous to or following the one particular shot that captured the light.

obviously i'm not an expert, but i do find the photo to be rather curious.
content.summary: Photo of star-like "object"

content.detailedDescription:
The witness account will be included as part of the investigator's narrative below.

the witness was an active duty 20+ year veteran police officer at the time this event occurred.  he is now retired and living in florida.

this case was investigated in 2002 but not added to the wufod data base due to problems encountered in the wufod system. 

tom sheets, sd mufonga, 26march08
content.summary: Off-duty police officer observes glowing white rectangle in bedroom

content.detailedDescription:
I stand in the front yard checking my on my bar-b-que,  and as usual i looked up towards the big dipper and these two star-like objects came into view . they looked like the iss passing over but they were closer to the ground  
they vanished into they horizion kind of , but it was as if they cut the lights off because the trailing star switch off his lights before he made to the point where the first object turned his off. they were heading nne 

they flew in a bird like formation only one was lagging behind 

i was puzzled because an airplane was out in the direction they went and i never heard of two satelites travel the same direction in the same orbit and stuff

they turned off the lights
content.summary: 2 bright objects no flashing lights

content.detailedDescription: I was 12 than, i was walking home from school when i noticed a light in the sky. it looked like nothing i've seen before. it was an isocilies triangle and was spinning as if rolling, 1 light on each point, and it was reddish black. there were lights all over the middle and was going at least 1,000 mph, and as quickly as it came, it vanished beyond the horizon, not making a singel sound. throught the experience and after i was shocked and very confuesed. most of it is black, and i got home at 11 o' clock.
content.summary: I was walking home when i saw a light

content.detailedDescription:
The objects were present in the sky, about 15degrees above the horizon southwest of maricopr, az. i went out for my nightly walk at 9:45 p.M. mst and immediately noticed two kite shaped objects in the southwest sky. i watched as i walked. the 2 were visible for approx 8 mins. they went off like a light switch being turned off. then a couple mins. later, one object appeared for 10-15 secs. about 2 degrees east of the first two objects. about 5 mins. later, two objects appeared abut 15 degrees east of the second object. it reained visible for approx 30 secs. anyone driving west on i-8 west of casaz grande, az. at that time would have seen them. the objects were, as i said, kite shaped with a cross typical of a kite sopport. thr lights were red, green, and yellow. there were approx. 10 lights to each object. i know there is a military area s/w of here, but flares generally "burn" out, not go out like a light switch being turned off. also, all flares i saw while in the military, burned white, not colored.
 i was at my residence when i saw the objects.
they stood out in the sky.
i thought it was a christmas decoration.
the object were stationary at all times, not sinking as a flare would.
by the time i went and got my truck keys to get my camera, the objecs were gone. i stayed out for 35 more mins. and saw no more.
content.summary: Two objects appeared for approx. 8 mins. then one bject appeared for 10-15 secs. then 5 mins. later 2 objectets appeared for 30 secs. several degrees east.

content.detailedDescription:
This neighbor, kay lives near me.  the people who have trees could not see it.  when i returned to make a call, there were two of them.   they were the size of a pencil eraser with a horizontal strip through them.  i mean the literal size of an eraser on a pencil.  i am a designer and an artist so i notice things around me.  i looked up and this object was slowly moving to the west.  when i returned from calling kay, there were two of them.  i returned to call jeff buford,  whose mother had been a close friend of mine and had started kltv,  but jeff couid not see them,, as he had many trees around his house but kay saw them.  i had always poopooed the idea of ufo's and felt that they were overly dramatized. i tried to call the paper and the television station but they were closed.  when i read the article in the current issue of the texas monthly, i realized that something must absolutely exist.

my late husband and i traveled the world and knew many  people in various governments.  before he died, he had founded the east texas council of world affairs.  i have a corner of the tyler public library of "current events"  that i supply books. i also give  foreign affairs and foreign policy to  library of texas college, a black college that is sorely lacking for funds. i  donate  books & magazines to gorman school and christ episcopal church (which is building a  new library)  so i
do have a certain validity.  i donated all of my husbands books recently (over 600) to the library of rhodes college and my library of some 3000 art books are going to the tyler museum of art.  i have made a specialty of islamic art and have lectured on  it at the university of texas at tyler.
content.summary: It was at 6am on sunday at the se quadrant of the sky.  i live on a hill with no trees and i called a neighbor

content.detailedDescription: I am a nurse who works the 3:p.M.- 11:p.M. shift. i had come home around 11:30 ish and was watching t.V. in my bedroom. my t.V. in my bedroom sits on my dresser, behind the dresser is two skylights, one directly behind my television.Between 2:20 & 2:30 or so i saw a bright, round glowing object fly at an incredible speed past my skylight in a downward trajectory towards the water across the street from my house. it was going (i think, not too good with directions)but from my vantage point,south to north. i live on a cove and it was headed straight that way.By the time i got up and went to the window it had disappeared. i know it wasn't a shooting star (seen a few of those before) but maybe a comet? or an asteroid? don't know therefore it is unidentified. it "caught" my eye because it was so bright in the night sky and fast!!My feeling and emotions were stunned amazement and excitemant with a large dose of curiosity.
content.summary: Bright,white ball shaped object.

content.detailedDescription: I have a 3 hole pattern on my left shoulder with either scar tissue or object underneath.  at first i thought it was some sort of acne and thought the might have been very large pores but ive had it for a year and looking at it closely it is more of a puncture or skin piercing and they travel inward at an angle toward eathother and i can feel something underneath the skin where it meets. its very small but its very odd especially how symetrical the pattern is.  im not claiming abduction or anything, ive had no experiences of anything like that. but was just wondering if you have seen this pattern before in any cases. ive never been injured or anything that would leave that mark, its something i just noticed one day and has continued to make me think. its probably nothing but thank you for listening.
content.summary: Unidentified scar pattern

content.detailedDescription:
my extended family and i were preparing a dinner while on vacation at pawleys island, sc.  there were 8 to 10 of us there ages 8 to 52, males and females.  someone shouted, "look at the ufos over there!" and sure enough, as i looked i saw the 5 dancing lights bouncing around very much like the way the sighting looked in the recent great britain video taken outside a pub.

  i had actually seen the exact same phenomenon in 1975, at lake bowen, in inman, sc when i was 19 years old.  a friend and i were sitting on the dock and it was probably about 10:30 to 12:00 pm/am and i was so excited and was yelling up toward the lake houses of my parents and our neighbors, trying, especially, to get my mom down to the dock before the ufos disappeared because my mother had seen one in washington, dc in 1952 and had been interviewed by the project blue book people and is a big believer, as am i.  my dock friend was truly the skeptical type but even he had to admit that it was a weird sight.

  during the 2003 event i tried desparately to get in touch with any radio station to let someone know about the ufos but they soon just vanished off into space as did the ones in the 1975 viewing.

  in 1976 i witnessed, by myself while driving away from someone's house ,a ufo which just hovered and made no sound.  it was not a star (too big) and ofcourse, not an airplane.  i just sat on the road in my car and stared at it up in the sky.  it was probably about midnight, or later, and it occurred in a rural area outside clemson, sc.  it felt as though we were having a staring contest though i could not see any type of being inside, or anything, but the craft just kept staying there, not moving, until i finally got tired and drove back to where i was staying.

  but the interesting thing is is that both times i saw groupings they were in a cluster of 5, some going to the left, some the right, some down, some up - no particular pattern. and the span of years was 28 years!

  why doesn't congress talk about this?!!!  we as americans have got to get the dialog going and out in the public realm.  this is insane to keep everything so "secret" when everybody knows it's really no secret, as millions of witnesses have seen unexplained flying objects. the disclosure project is great, but the national press club meeting was 8 years ago!  hello?!

  i am hopeful this information is somehow helpful.  wish i'd done more "digging" on my own and had known about mufon and it's too bad the sigthtings were so long ago, but every bit of witness testimony must help the cause, i imagine, to get legislators and whomever interested enough to declassify all the documents area 51 and the military are holding.

best regards, 

dc
content.summary: 5 star-like objects jumped around up and down, sideways, completely unlike any airplanes

content.detailedDescription: My friends and i were playing basketball in a parking lot, when one of my friends saw something in the sky. at first sight, it just looked like fireworks. there were about 50-75 spherical objects flying around each other in the sky. they were completely silent. they would swarm in and out of each other, and then they made a formation that looked like a bow tie. they stayed in the formation of a bow tie for about 15 seconds, and then they swarmed in and out of each other again. while they were flying around each other, they were slowly making their way northwest. they were very agile, and they were having no trouble cutting in any direction instantly. eventually they stopped moving northwest, and they just started to slowly go higher up, until we couldn't see them anymore.
content.summary: 50-75 ufos swarming overhead

content.detailedDescription: At aprox. 19:45 mst i was talking on my cell to my v.P. re the days events, i was standing next to my pool in my backyard, when i looked upward into the sky to the south / southwest. i noticed a set of lights that caught my attention, they were moving, what appeared to be slowly from the southwest to the northeast. the light in the front was much brighter then the one in the trailing position both were white or off white in color. as i watched them progress for about 30 sec. it became apparent that they were not the normal lights i am accustom to seeing on aircraft flying into /out of phoenix sky harbor int. i told my v.P. i was watching a ufo, of course he told me i wasent, i then called out to my girlfriend in the house to come outside and look at what i was seeing. i instructed her to not let it out of her sight while i retrieved my binoculars. upon my return the lights started to fade somewhat as i tried to bring the object into view, i wasent able to get a clear view through my binoculars for more than a few sec. so i wasent able to gather much about the mass or structure of the obj. it appeared to be aprox. 8000-10000 ft. agl. it made no sounds that i or we could hear. in my opinion as a general aviation pilot there were no position lights or strobe / anti collision lights of any sort on this craft, for lack of a better word. it moved at a steady pace and made no erratic movements of any kind, at first glance it appeared to be a comm. jet on approach to landing, however i have watched many jets fly over and can honestly say that what i saw this night wasent at all the same. we may never know.
content.summary: Observed 2 lights tracking across sky from s.W. to n.E dir. the ft. or lead light was 75% brighter than the one in trail they were in site for aprox. 3 min. then disapeared.

content.detailedDescription:
On march 23, 2008 at approx 12:55 to 12:58 pm , while looking at various high altitude jets and the contrails i notice a small bright white object about estimate 15000 to 25,000ft? 
it was at 55 degrees to the horizon facing and moving sw to a ne direction heading over and towards the north slope of the sandia mountains north of the city limits of albuquerque.
what i observed was what i though was a seagull or white bird catching thermals at a high altitude���the more i looked at it i notice a unusual side to side flight as if it was fluttering like a butterfly might fly. it was moving slow in a ne direction and notice it was blinking every one to three second intervals but at a location different from the other and no sound was heard���giving a fluttering appearance. at arms length the flash was the size of a button.
the sighting seem to last two to three minutes before it was beyond the horizon from my view���.It was defiantly below the clouds and my guess is about the same altitude of private single or twin engine planes?
i attempted to try and take photos with my cell phone but was unable to.
content.summary: Small flashing light that seems to move or give a fluttering appearance....

content.detailedDescription:
My son and i watched a vertical contrail with a bright tip at the base hang in the western sky (just to the left of the setting sun), wondering if a plane or rocket was crashing to earth, as the bottom clearly was a self-luminous object.  i have never seen a contrail at that strangely vertical angle, my attention was drawn by the unusual shape as i sat on the sofa facing a picture window i rarely look out of. the short contrail did not lengthen downward, but remained the same size, which made me realize that the object at the bottom was not crashing to earth. the upper part of the contrail faded very slowly (4 minutes or so), leaving the bottom star-shaped circle brightly self-illuminated at the bottom.  this light remained unchanged for at least 5 to seven  minutes until it was out of view due to the eastward rotation of the earth.  the condos across from us eventually covered our view of the bright star-like object, which did not move or fade at all.  i have seen some obvious ufos in my lifetime.  this sighting is just an unknown.  i did not have the definite feeling or knowledge as in former sighting  that this one was extra terrestrial.  it is merely very strange, as i can not imagine a plane or missile falling towards earth only to come to an abrupt stop and then hover, nor a metallic weather balloon that would dangle from the bottom of a vertical contrail.

the sun has now set.  it is 7:32 as i finish writing this note to you.

thank you
content.summary: Vertical contrail with bright object at bottom as sun was setting

content.detailedDescription:
2/20/08 i was recording the lunar moon between 9pm-10:15pm in north chicago il. at my girl house, on the back porch with the window open. it was very cold that night! i know they said on the news that the satalite was suppose to get shot down, but it dont suppose to reach earth until march and when it hit the atmosphere, it wasn't gone be no bigger then a foot ball!
i emailed cnn,fox and cltv and told them what i recorded that night and i didn't get no response back yet! maybe they think i'm pulling their coat tails or something.
i don't know, but as i was recording the lunar moon with an old camcorter,(sony hi 8. model:ccd-trv108)so you know i can't stage or fake what i recorded, all of a sudden out of nowhere, this bright light was falling real fast and disappeared.My girl thought it was a falling star and i said stars don't fall! i knew it couldn't of been the satalite either! so what was it?
the next day i played my tape back and what i saw wasn't no falling star, no satalite and damn sure not no air plane!!!!!!
it was this light from a far distance, but yet in our atmosphere falling super fast. as i kept rewinding my tape, around this light, looked like some smaller type lights, flashing all around it, poping on and off like shoots from a gun at night! it wasn't attached to the falling light, it was flickering from a distance around it!(mind you, it was from a far distance, recorded on an old camcorter!)
i seen ships all my life and i would of thought i was crazy if i seen them by myself, but i always have somebody there to witness it with me every time! this time i got it recorded on tape and it's all real!!!!!!!!
i let my dad and friends view it and they can't explain what it could be either.
i can't down load it on my computer, because i don't have the proper connects to plug to my camcorter and computer. the computer old too! need an upgrade.Lol! 
but anyways, i just been sitting on my tape, trying to get some feed back and hopefully paid for my discovery, caught on camara!!!!!
i'm sorry i can't send a copy, but i still got it thow!
contact me or leave a email and let me know what should i do from here.

thank you,

         w. randy pitts
content.summary: Light falling real fast, with other lights bursting around it.

content.detailedDescription: I was awoken by a very bright amber sphere that was shining through my skylight above my bed. i felt like this thing was looking at me through the skylight.It looked to be about as the size of the full moon, however it was difficult to discern the distance, it seemed not more than 50 to 100 feet above my house. i only saw it for about 20 seconds then it disappeared. my mom and stepdad were in the main bedroom and were awakened by the sound of a doorbell and noise in the room next door. i do not have a doorbell and nobody lives next door. i went outside with a flashlight and got the landlord to look around with me. it was very silent outside and overcast and we found no trace of anything. right after this thing disappeared it shook the house. i am not sure what this thing was but it seemed to have an intelligence as i felt like it was trying to communicate with me.
content.summary: Very bright amber sphere

content.detailedDescription: Attempting to send the 6 photos again within the zip file.
content.summary: Attempting to send the zip file again for my previous report. it would not accept it for some reason.

content.detailedDescription: I was photographing the daytime sky on my back deck, pointing the camera towards the south-west/western area of the sky from st. catharines, ontario which is in the eastern time zone.  i did not notice this object while initially photographing, and probably could not have found it with the naked eye even if i had been trying, the sun was extremely bright and caused massive glare. once i seen i had caught it on the camera, i went back and took 4 more pictures, and the final one while trying to get the object without the sun within the picture. i did a little research, and assumed what i was looking at was venus.  i read you can apparently see venus always near the sun, but from what i read, venus should be west of the sun, not east, unless im mistaken.  it appears to have a comet like tail pointing towards the sun, yet looks like it had moved in various pictures.  the one photo where i tried to get the object singularly, without the sun in the background, shows what appears to be two tails pointing in different directions, and showed up much more faint without the sun within the picture.  photo sn850079.Jpg shows the object much closer to sun, almost hidden within the glare, yet it is still there, just a little south-south-east of the sun if one were to use the exact middle of the sun as a reference point.  i don't believe this is any kind of unknown craft, descriptions i have read of the credible unknowns people have caught in film/photographs, do not match up with what i caught in the photo. i assume it is some astronomical object that i am unaware of. i have included the 6 photographs compressed in a zip file, along with 2 of the raw images for people to see while browsing the site, without having to download the whole 16.6 mb. hopefully someone at mufon could shed some light on what celestial object i had caught in the photo.  i was using a samsung s85 8.2 megapixel digital camera.
content.summary: I caught this object in 6 pictures while photographing the daytime sky at around 4pm est on march 23, 2008.

content.detailedDescription: I was looking out my window listening to music when i observed a group of eight rods then one more when the one more joined the group.They were three abreast with two in the last row.The eighth one stopped and left the group,stayed still in place then rejoined the group.The ninth then flew to join the group seconds later.They were 20 feet above my head,i was 40 feet up in my apartment when i observed them.They were cylinder shaped and gold in color,looking like golden shards of light.The eighth one stopped to wait for the ninth rod to catch up with the group then when it saw the ninth rod catching up the eighth rejoined the group.That was over 20 years ago and i haven't seen anything like it since,i do believe they were alive.I was not afraid but fascinated they were a true wonder and i would like to see thm again!
content.summary: Golden rods,cylindrical,9 in all first eight.One dropped out of group,waited for last one then rejoined group, last one joined group.

content.detailedDescription:
i arrived home from work around two am in the morning. as i stepped from my truck i caught the glimpse of a light that was in the northern sky above the tree line. it seemed to be at a distance so i didnt pay it much mind. as i walked to the front door of my home, the source of light was not so far away. it was actually just above the trees.  i stepped onto my porch and the light then slowly from hovering above the tree, moved over to about ten feet from the porch and about ten feet from the ground.
     there was no noise, and i did not feel threatened in any way. the light just hovered there.  as i stood there for approx. two minutes just looking at it, the object then began to emit a sound from it.  it was a low tone.  it was as if the object was playing music to me. it went from a low tone to a high tone, then back to the low tone. as it stood there trying to figure out what it was the object then began to change color as the tone it was emmiting began to change in pitch and length of tone.  
     the object "played" the "music" to me for a period of time i did not make a note of.  as i stood there listening, i raised my hand and tried to feel if there was any heat coming from it, it then made two bright glows of a light blue light the became silent.  it hovered there for a few seconds then it darted into the night sky at a high rate of speed.
     i have no idea what it was nor what it was doing in my presence. i do believe in life out in the universe, and on other planets, and i would like to believe some other species was attempting to make some kind of contact with me however i was unable to understand within my own mind what had taken place.  what ever or whom ever it was i am hoping for another meeting.
content.summary: Attempted communication with unknown glowing sphere that "played music"

content.detailedDescription: I was in my front yard at sunset taking pictures of the sunset then the ufo appeard in the sky so i took a picture of it after that the ufo got closer and landed in my backyard and that is all i remember
content.summary: It was very frighting

content.detailedDescription: I was taking pictures of cloud formation's for my desktop photo on the day before easter 3-22-08,the ufo was not visible to the naked eye but the camera got it.Needless to say my jaw dropped when i zoomed in on the spot on the picture.
content.summary: Ufo was in picture i took the day before easter

content.detailedDescription: My friend and i were playing around in my back yard and he saw it first and told me to look up. when i did i saw just the bottom of it and it had 6 circles of mixed colors swirling around and a seventh circle in the middle of it doing the same thing. it must have have been the engines on it. it was about 1,000 feet in the air and it was heading north and it was a overcast night and i could see it clearly. i know what airplanes look like and helicopters look like and this was not either of them. it made no sound at all. and about 10 minutes later these 4 fighter jets came streaking over going the same direction as the ufo was going. i think that they were from bainbridge island, since that's the only naval base around the everett area. then after about 15 minutes the fighter jets came back over where i was standing going back south from where it had come from. since that time i've been a believer in ufos and have read several books on the subject. i wish back in 1968 there would have been the internet so i could have told somebody about it back then. to this day i really don't say too much about it because people may think i'm crazy, but i do believe in them. now where them come from who knows?
content.summary: Round and glowing

content.detailedDescription:
We were coming back from la and on the country road between temecula and anza california.

i was the passenger in the car we were driving about 60 mph. i thought a real fast car was passing us because there was no other cars. 

this is a road where people do drive fast but as i looked back the object was not on the road it quickly cam along side of us flying above the ground about 50 feat. 

it was on the drivers side but it was so bright but did not hurt my eyes. after a few seconds it whet up in the sky. then i see on tv they saw something in texas. 

i had a doctors appointment and can get the exact date.

david markarian
content.summary: Country road between temecula and anza california.

content.detailedDescription:
I was grilling some thicks steaks on the bbq, well i was staring at the stars enjoying the cool breeze on a beautiful evening. as i stood there i saw what i thought to be a shooting star or some type of satellite. the dot of light came from behind a stand of trees so it was seen suddenly,and caught my eye,  my first reaction or thought was an aircraft but it did not have marker lites. just a single point of intense light. i was able to call for my wife and daughter and we all stood and watched the object cross the skyline west to east and fade into the distance in around 12-14 secs. 
  the object looked like a very bright star and appeared to be in the outer atmosphere. the object was silent,and moved with intent,meaning that it did not appear to be in a orbit. in fact, before the steaks were done i had  the family outside twice more looking at some run of the mill satellites, and  a high altitude jetliner for comparison. in comparison the other two satellites were a fraction of the speed, but they were traveling south to north.
content.summary: Dot of light  crossed sky west to east at highrate of speed silently or so high you could not hear it.

content.detailedDescription: I was looking for the big dipper while on a walk. i saw an object in the sky and i thought it was a metero shower. when the object moved to thin clouds close by the outter shape became more apparent a thin white on the outter edge of it, also a yellow y-shape down the center which had a pale yellow color. the object just moved at a steady place into the clouds about 500 feet above my head. the ufo disappered into the clouds. during this event i could not believe what i was seeing. after i relized what it was i was excited to see this incredible experience.
content.summary: Figure eight shaped, with point at each end, thin light around the other edge of ufo

content.detailedDescription:
I was waiting for a friend outside his house near a wooded area and cow pasture. i was sitting on the grass when i looked up and saw a saucer-shaped craft approaching very slowly from the northeast. it was quite low already and came to a spot directly above me. this occurred i believe in 1966 when i was 6 or 7. i had not experience or reference for flying saucers at that time.

i was not afraid at all. just curious about the interesting 'plane' i saw in the sky above me.

the craft had a polished aluminum/platinum metal exterior and a very slight dome on top. it seemed the size of  an average 3-bedroom house. there were no windows that i could see but on the bottom was a round circle of colored lights, which were changing according to its movement. as it hovered over me the lights rotated a variety of colors very slowly (not sure if the craft itself was rotating). however, after a couple of minutes it ascended slightly more quickly and the lights seemed to rotate more rapidly and with more colors.

(and no, this was not like the jupiter ii from lost in space but a lot more polished and streamlined than that.)

i believe there were additional, larger circles/lights on the outside of the colored lights. there were no legs or wheels that i could see.

no light or anything emanated from the craft. i did have the sensation it was simply checking me out. i do not know if i experience what you would call missing time. i did see my friend afterward as they had some new puppies i wanted to see. i did not tell them about the plane (why should i as i had no idea this was something that should not be in the sky?)

there was no noise that i recall, nor vapor trail. it flew off, moving higher in altitude in the same direction from which it came.

i think that i did tell my mother when i went home about the round airplane with no wings. i'm sure she was amused.

not much of a ufo buff or obsessive but i do believe in what i saw and trust my childhood memory of it.
content.summary: Daylight sighting hovering craft directly overhead and low to ground

content.detailedDescription: I was taking sky photos from my front yard and was able to catch an airplane and possible ufo in the same photo.
content.summary: Possible ufo in same photo as airplane

content.detailedDescription:
1974-or-1975:  the witness was approx. 15 or 16 years old, while riding in a car with a friend in village of camden. they were riding away from town on dunbar rd. when an orange ball slightly larger than a golf ball hovered centered, 12" over the hood of the car. 
     they became frightened, and turned around, heading back towards the high school on mill st.. when near the intersection of oswego st. the sky lit up and they first became aware of the ufo presence. 
     a large ufo illuminated the immediate sky, trees, & complete surrounding area. it lit up a tree line approx. 150-200 yards away. it appeared to be hovering or sitting upon the high school roof, approx. 300 ft. distant.
     the object appeared to be the size of two semi-trailers long, about 100 ft. in length. the object appeared trapazoidal in shape with upward sloping sides, and a row of windows. there were 9 entities looking at them and turning their heads as if conversing.
     within one to two minutes, they became aware of two grey entities appearing at the driver side window, and two or three appearing at the the witness' passenger side window. one also stood at the front of the car holding a white glowing ball approx. 8-10 inches in dia. the entity held it in both hands with arms somewhat extended.
     the next thing the witness could immediately recall, was standing outside in the door of the car. he noticed what appeared to be a laser spot touching on his chest.
     not knowing, or remembering opening the car door, he looked up at the ship which was closer now. a grey entity stood up in a "roof hatch" at the top of the ship. he threw something out, and looked directly at the witness. 
     the witness was scared and jumped back in the car, he and his friend fled the area.
     years later the witness relived this event in a dream/memory and recalled being dragged semi-concious through a doorway and placed naked on an exam table, or doctor's bench.
     the witness was terrified. he recalls a very sharp instrument being inserted up his nose, he could feel it penetrate into his sinus cavity.
      there were 5 or 6 entities surrounding him, and they began to take one of his eyes out. he tried to scream in pain but couldn't and one of the grey entities touched his head and shoulder area, and the pain seemed to stop.
content.summary: Large craft lit up sky, hovering above high school, beings sighted, missing time, abduction.

content.detailedDescription: I was standing on the deck having a smoke at 1045pm. a bright flash to the north caught my attention,i observed a sphere moving south very quickly. it stopped suddenly....Then moved sideways....Stopped and hovered in a position about a quarter mile from the house.About five hundred feet up it sat there flashing and wobbling. it flashed 6 to 8 times a second,and seemed to wobble back and forth slightly. there were few visable stars as there was considerable cloud cover. i ran in the house grabbed the camera, returned to take photos. at that point the object was even lower in the sky..I snapped these photos with a tripod.....Then the sphere just vanished. i have hundreds of photos like this....I see similar objects no less than 3 times a week. have yet to see photos like these.....No it is not camera shake....Was shot with a tripod.
content.summary: Extremely bright sphere flashing 6 to eight times per second

content.detailedDescription: Approximately october 1, 1973, my husband and i were home in st. clair shores, michigan.  my sister-in-law and mother-in-law pulled into our driveway and directed us to view an object in the sky.  we looked up and saw a white light in the sky.  it was not moving.  it seemed quite large.  we stood and watched it for a while.  i called my neighbor friend from across the street over.  the five of us stood and watched it. i got out my binoculars.  i told my husband to get the telescope out from the garage and he set it up. we passed the binoculars around so that everyone could see. i called selfridge air force base and inquired about it. they knew nothing about it.  then i called the news station. first the reporter stated it was a weather balloon.  i said that thing is not a weather balloon. i said we have a telescope set up with a camera ready to photograph the comet kohoutek.  i was surprised when the reporter's voice changed and he then told me. "yea, we don't know what it is, but we have it on film and it is big as a house". i thanked him and hung up (i was surprised). most people at that time were not familiar with the comet kohoutek so i guess the reporter thought i was a scientist. (i wish we did actually have a camera on the telescope) we kept watching the light in the sky. we then noticed something happening. a red light descended from the bottom of the sphere, straight down.  the red light then stopped and waited until the white sphere began disintegrating. when the much larger white sphere had completely disintegrated, the red light began proceeding in a somewhat southwesterly direction. because i had completed a meteorology course, i didn't believe it to be a weather phenomena. it made no sound at any time. we could not see anything else other than the large white light and the much smaller red light. our thoughts were that a small vehicle had left a mother ship. the white specks falling to earth from the disintegrating white sphere did not fall to earth so that one could collect or inspect them.  i watched the newspapers.  two weeks later (around october 11, 1973) i read of the abduction of calvin parker and charles hikson in pascagoula, mississippi.
content.summary: Large white sphere stationary in sky, small red object decends then waits for white sphere to disintegrate. the red object then flys away.
